summary:
For over 20 years, I have been providing administrative support to various projects and teams in the field of international development, working with Organization's such as Hivos, Embassy of Bolivia, and Embassy of Nicaragua. I have developed a strong set of skills and competencies in financial administration, project monitoring, office administration, and communication and collaboration, as well as a deep understanding of the cultural, political, and social aspects of the Latin American region.

Recently I have worked as Administrative Assistant at WASTE NL, a Dutch NGO that focuses on sustainable waste management and sanitation solutions. In this role, I am responsible for preparing and documenting meetings, reviewing partner contracts and payment requests, supporting financial administration, assisting in IATI reporting, and coordinating team schedules. I also use my languages skills to facilitate communication and collaboration with our partners and stakeholders. I am passionate about contributing to the mission and vision of the organization, and I enjoy working in a dynamic and diverse environment.
